Package src.recomanador.domini

Class ContentBasedFiltering

java.lang.Object
src.recomanador.domini.ContentBasedFiltering
public class ContentBasedFiltering extends Object
This class implements the recomendation algorithm content based filtering.

    • contentBasedFiltering

      public ArrayList<ItemValoracioEstimada> contentBasedFiltering(int Q, int user_ID, int k) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.UserNotFoundException
      Returns a set of item IDs, sorted by relevance, using Collaborative Filtering for the given user
      Parameters:
      Q - how many items to be recommended
      user_ID - ID of the user to be recommended
      k - number of clusters to be generated on k-means
      Returns:
      a sorted set the recommended item IDs
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.UserNotFoundException - if the id specified is not valid
